step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move.
Focus on keeping your elbows slightly bent and wrists neutral as you reach overhead.
Great job squeezing your shoulder blades together and tightening your muscles. Remember to inhale.
Well done extending your arms overhead and exhaling. Try to keep your elbows from bending too much.
Excellent relaxation and return to the starting position. Ensure your wrists stay straight.
Second rep starting strong! Maintain relaxed shoulders and open fingers.
Good control with your elbows and wrists as you reach up.
Excellent muscle engagement and shoulder blade squeeze. Keep up the good breathing pattern.
Nice extension overhead. Focus on keeping your elbows straight as you exhale.
Perfectly relaxed finish. Ensure your wrists remain straight throughout the movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your shoulders relaxed and fingers open at the start. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and maintaining good form with your arms and wrists throughout the movement.
